reporting-org.narrative: The William and Flora Hewlett Foundation

title.narrative: "for an evaluation system to assess access to health services and maternal mortality in Mexico"

description.narrative: "The Observatory of Maternal Mortality has carried out monitoring exercises of public policies to improve access to maternal health services at the state level. This grant will allow the observatory to monitor the quality of health services for vulnerable populations in four states. The observatory will develop indicators of acceptability of public health services with the objective of them being used by the National Council of Evaluation to evaluate access and quality of public health services for vulnerable populations. "
